definitions.Ying2 pan2: Yingpan, common place name ('army camp'); place near Jintian village 金田村[Jin1 tian2 cun1] in Guangxi where the Taiping Tianguo rebels took their oaths in 1851; place in Xinfeng county 新豐縣|新丰县[Xin1 feng1 Xian4] traditional camping place of brigands; Yingpan township, place name; Yingpan in Shangluo prefecture, Shaanxi; Yingpan township in Yunnan; (many others);
